attributes.action: Add a new " None Of The Above" Option to the voting paper
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We residents of the UK only think its fair that as voter's we should be given the option to vote for " None Of The Above". Some people do want to vote but dont want to vote for anyone thats on the paper, therefore should have the choice to vote for "None Of The Above"

rejection.details: Tehre are other petitions which overlap with this one e.g. http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/noneoftheabove/ Please consider signing one of these before re-submitting.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
